member.name: T:CommandLine.CommandLineParserException
member.summary: This exception is thrown when a generic parsing error occurs.

member.name: T:CommandLine.ValueListAttribute
member.summary: Models a list of command line arguments that are not options. Must be applied to a field compatible with an interface of instances.

member.name: M:CommandLine.ValueListAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A type that implements .
member.exception: Thrown if is null.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ValueListAttribute.MaximumElements
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum element allow for the list managed by type. If lesser than 0, no upper bound is fixed. If equal to 0, no elements are allowed.

member.name: T:CommandLine.HelpOptionAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the instance method that must be invoked when it becomes necessary show your help screen. The method signature is an instance method with no parameters and return value.

member.name: T:CommandLine.BaseOptionAttribute
member.summary: Provides base properties for creating an attribute, used to define rules for command line parsing.

member.name: P:CommandLine.BaseOptionAttribute.ShortName
member.summary: Short name of this command line option. You can use only one character.

member.name: P:CommandLine.BaseOptionAttribute.LongName
member.summary: Long name of this command line option. This name is usually a single english word.

member.name: P:CommandLine.BaseOptionAttribute.Required
member.summary: True if this command line option is required.

member.name: P:CommandLine.BaseOptionAttribute.HelpText
member.summary: A short description of this command line option. Usually a sentence summary.

member.name: M:CommandLine.HelpOptionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommandLine.HelpOptionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Allows you to define short and long option names.
member.param: The short name of the option or null if not used.
The long name of the option or null if not used.

member.name: P:CommandLine.HelpOptionAttribute.Required
member.summary: Returns always false for this kind of option. This behaviour can't be changed by design; if you try set an will be thrown.

member.name: T:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo
member.summary: Models the copyright informations part of an help text. You can assign it where you assign any instance.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying author and year.
member.param: The company or person holding the copyright.
The year of coverage of copyright.
member.exception: Thrown when parameter is null or empty string.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying author and years.
member.param: The company or person holding the copyright.
The years of coverage of copyright.
member.exception: Thrown when parameter is null or empty string.
Thrown when parameter is not supplied.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying symbol case, author and years.
member.param: The case of the copyright symbol.
The company or person holding the copyright.
The years of coverage of copyright.
member.exception: Thrown when parameter is null or empty string.
Thrown when parameter is not supplied.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.ToString
member.summary: Returns the copyright informations as a .
member.returns: The that contains the copyright informations.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.op_Implicit(CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo)~System.String
member.summary: Converts the copyright informations to a .
member.param: This instance.
member.returns: The that contains the copyright informations.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.FormatYears(System.Int32[])
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, allows to specify a new algorithm to render copyright years as a instance.
member.param: A array of years.

member.name: P:CommandLine.Text.CopyrightInfo.CopyrightWord
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, allows to specify a different copyright word.

member.name: T:CommandLine.ICommandLineParser
member.summary: Defines a basic interface to parse command line arguments.

member.name: M:CommandLine.ICommandLineParser.ParseArguments(System.String[],System.Object)
member.summary: Parses a array of command line arguments, setting values in parameter instance's public fields decorated with appropriate attributes.
member.param: A array of command line arguments.
An object's instance used to receive values. Parsing rules are defined using derived types.
member.exception: Thrown if is null.
Thrown if is null.

member.name: M:CommandLine.ICommandLineParser.ParseArguments(System.String[],System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Parses a array of command line arguments, setting values in parameter instance's public fields decorated with appropriate attributes. This overload allows you to specify a derived instance for write text messages.
member.param: A array of command line arguments.
An object's instance used to receive values. Parsing rules are defined using derived types.
Any instance derived from , usually . Setting this argument to null, will disable help screen.
member.exception: Thrown if is null.
Thrown if is null.

member.name: T:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings
member.summary: Specifies a set of features to configure a behavior.

member.name: M:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the case comparison behavior.
member.param: If set to true, parsing will be case sensitive.

member.name: M:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the used for help method output.
member.param: Any instance derived from , default . Setting this argument to null, will disable help screen.

member.name: M:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting case comparison and help output options.
member.param: If set to true, parsing will be case sensitive.
Any instance derived from , default . Setting this argument to null, will disable help screen.

member.name: M:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting case comparison and mutually exclusive behaviors.
member.param: If set to true, parsing will be case sensitive.
If set to true, enable mutually exclusive behavior.

member.name: M:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting case comparison, mutually exclusive behavior and help output option.
member.param: If set to true, parsing will be case sensitive.
If set to true, enable mutually exclusive behavior.
Any instance derived from , default . Setting this argument to null, will disable help screen.

member.name: P:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets the case comparison behavior. Default is set to true.

member.name: P:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.MutuallyExclusive
member.summary: Gets or sets the mutually exclusive behavior. Default is set to false.

member.name: P:CommandLine.CommandLineParserSettings.HelpWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the used for help method output. Setting this property to null, will disable help screen.
